text: Nizhnyaya Akberda () is a rural locality (a village) in Muynaksky Selsoviet, Zianchurinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 127 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 32 km from Isyangulovo, 4 km from Verkhny Muynak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zianchurinsky District
title: Nizhnyaya Akberda
